name: airtrail
description: AirTrail is a personalized flight logbook app for pilots. It allows storing flight entries, tracking totals and hours, and visualizing flight activity. It also includes privacy-first self-hosting features and import/export options.

features.title: Flight Logging
features.description: Store detailed flight entries with comprehensive data tracking. Your complete aviation history

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View flight patterns and statistics through visual dashboards. Understand your flying habits

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution keeps your flight data completely private. Your logbook, your control

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Easily transfer data between systems and backup your records. Never lose your flight history
